reviewText: My 2 1/2 year old grandson just loved Scoop's Favorite Adventures.  I'm not sure how many times we've watched it since the DVD arrived but it's beeen plenty.

I ordered this video because it said it came with a toy scoop. It didn't! It's just a video. This is the first time I've not gotten what I ordered! I still gave a good review because the video is great!

The reason why I purchased this was for the scoop figure which was not in the product I recieved. i also made the mistake of reading the reviews which said this was a DVD.....it is a VHS. So if you want a VHS with NO scoop this is your product.
My 2.5 year old loves this DVD.  I love the fact that episodes are around 10 minutes long so we can watch 2 or 3 without going over his screen time limit.
a great little movie for my little boy to watch and learn. it arrived fast and at a great price. thanks again for prompt service. we love it.

My 3yr old Grandson enjoyed this episode. It was a little different for him because he's more used to an energetic fare like The Imagination Movers or Spiderman. That said, the slower pace did us both good and now its time for some Elmo. Gotta go :-)Bob the Builder - Scoop's Favorite Adventures
